name: Fireworks (itch) (LamaMakesMusic)
description:
I did a lilttle game jam on my own and created this small firework twitch chat game.

It maps the suns position based on the real time.
By default the game will spawn rockets between 00:00 - 04:00 o'clock.
If the game is connected to a twitch chat during that time, users in chat will also trigger rockets. Those user-rockets will end up with the chat-users color and display their message in the sky.

You can edit the time of sunrise and sunset along other things in the config.xml, which is located inside the StreamingAssets - Directory.

I recommend reducing the daytime and thus increase the night time, since I'm not a good designer, so the world looks better hidden by the darkness of the night :D

Make sure to generate a oAuth Token for your Twitch Account (e.g. using TwitchTokenGenerator.com) and to enter it along with your username and the twitch channel in the config.xml as well.

As I mentioned it was a game jam I did, so I created the project in a few days.
So, please, don't expect too many features and customization options.
